Package io.confluent.ksql.security

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    KsqlAccessValidator
    An interface that provides ACL validation on Kafka topics.
    KsqlAuthorizationProvider
    Interface that provides authorization to KSQL.
    KsqlAuthorizationValidator
    Checks if a user or ServiceContext have permissions to execute the specified KSQL Statement.
    KsqlSecurityExtension
    This interface provides a security extension (or plugin) to the KSQL server in order to protect the access to REST, Websockets, and other internal KSQL resources.
    KsqlUserContextProvider
    Provides access to clients required to communicate with remote services using the context of a specified user name and/or credentials.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExtensionSecurityManager
    A simple security manager extension to block UDFs from calling System.exit or executing processes
    ExtensionSecurityManagerTest  
    KsqlAuthorizationValidatorFactory  
    KsqlAuthorizationValidatorFactoryTest  
    KsqlAuthorizationValidatorImpl
    This authorization implementation checks if the user can perform Kafka and/or SR operations on the topics or schemas found in the specified KSQL Statement.
    KsqlAuthorizationValidatorImplTest  
    KsqlBackendAccessValidator
    An implementation of KsqlAccessValidator that provides authorization checks from the backend services.
    KsqlBackendAccessValidatorTest  
    KsqlCacheAccessValidator
    An implementation of KsqlAccessValidator that provides authorization checks from a memory cache.
    KsqlCacheAccessValidatorTest  
    KsqlDefaultSecurityExtension
    This is the default security extension for KSQL.
    KsqlProvidedAccessValidator
    An implementation of KsqlAccessValidator that provides authorization checks from a external authorization provider.
    KsqlProvidedAccessValidatorTest  
    KsqlSecurityContext
    A class that provides KSQL security related information for KSQL user requests.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AuthObjectType
